cards.rules_text: When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Whenever this creature or an enchantment you control enters, you gain 1 life.

Vigilance
When this creature enters, create a Gloom token attached to target opponent. [i](It's a Curse enchantment with “At the beginning of combat on enchanted player's turn, tap target creature they control and put a stun counter on it. When you do, sacrifice this Curse.”)[/i]

Defender
As long as you control an Aura, this creature has flying and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

Flying
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {W}. If you do, return this creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

When this creature enters, create a Paranoia token attached to target opponent. [i](It's a Curse enchantment with “When enchanted player is dealt combat damage, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then sacrifice this Curse.”)[/i]
{2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

During your turn, this creature has first strike.
When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures you control.

When this creature enters, search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
This creature gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Aura.
Whenever you gain life, create a 1/1 black Wraith enchantment creature token with “This creature can't block.” This ability triggers only once each turn.

When this creature enters, create a Gloom token attached to target opponent. [i](It's a Curse enchantment with “At the beginning of combat on enchanted player's turn, tap target creature they control and put a stun counter on it. When you do, sacrifice this Curse.”)[/i]

cards.card_name: CU12 Curse of the Haunting Effigy
cards.rules_text:
Enchant player
When this Curse enters, create a 3/3 colorless Spirit enchantment creature with defender.
Creatures may attack enchanted player as though they didn't have defender.

Choose one — 
• Target creature you control can't be blocked this turn.
• Exile target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

Target nonland permanent's owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
Create a 1/1 black Wraith enchantment creature token with “This creature can't block.”

Bargain [i](You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Choose one. You may choose both instead of this spell was bargained.
• Target player draws three cards.
• Target player mills four cards.

Deathtouch
When this creature dies, create a Doubt token attached to target opponent. [i](It's a Curse enchantment with “When enchanted player casts a spell, they lose 2 life. Then sacrifice this Curse.”)[/i]
When this creature dies, create a 1/1 black Wraith enchantment creature token with “This creature can't block.”

Bargain [i](You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Menace
When this creature enters, if it was bargained, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

Whenever you sacrifice another creature or enchantment, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This ability only triggers once each turn.
